name: Destruction Of Our Oceans (OLC CodeJam 2019)
description:
Made for the 2019 OLC Codejam.

This year's theme was DESTRUCTION!!! I chose to go a slightly obscure route, by building a game about the on-going destruction of our oceans from all the plastic and trash. I know, riveting. Play as a piece of trash floating through the ocean and avoid being eaten by fish. Complete with peppy music, poorly drawn sprites, and snarky comments.

I hope you enjoy it! Source code and assets available for download on this page.

How to play:

Use the arrow keys or "wasd" to move around, press "r" to replay, and "m" to mute the background music.

Bonus: press "t" to enable the debug display, and "b" to blow bubbles.

Written in Python using Pygame, using these free assets:

Music from https://filmmusic.io
